lyric:
[by:小坑鹏]
[00:00.00]I'm Looking for a place I can come my home, my home, wow~
[00:08.20]Looking for a place where I belong, belong, wow~
[00:15.74]Maybe I fall or maybe I drown again and love again, wow~
[00:23.12]Maybe I fall or maybe I drown again and pain again, wow~
[00:30.66]Even if the sky is falling down,falling down, I would search for you
[00:38.19]Even if the sky is falling down,falling down, I won’t give up on you
[00:45.00]
[01:19.35]I'm looking for a place that be myself,myself,wow~
[01:26.96]Looking for a place where I feel safe again,feel safe again,wow~
[01:34.45]Maybe I fall or maybe I lose again,this faith again, wow~
[01:41.91]Maybe I fall or maybe I doubt again,alone again, wow~
[01:49.45]Even if the sky is falling down,falling down, I would search for you
[01:56.93]Even if the sky is falling down,falling down, I won’t give up on you
[02:03.57]
tlyric:
[by:鹿洱宸]
[00:00.00]我在寻找一个可以称之为家的地方
[00:08.20]寻找一个我真正属于的地方
[00:15.74]或许我会一次次倒下、一次次溺亡，但我依然能有爱的能力
[00:23.12]或许我会一次次倒下、一次次溺亡、不断的受伤
[00:30.66]即使天空坠落，世界分崩离析，我也要寻找你
[00:38.19]就算天空坠落，一切灰飞烟灭，我也不会抛下你
[01:19.35]我在寻找一个可以做我自己的地方，无需设防
[01:26.96]寻找一个可以再次感到安心的地方，不再惊惶
[01:34.45]或许我会一次次倒下、一次次失去，我依然坚持心中的信仰
[01:41.91]或许我会一次次倒下、一次次被质疑，在这世上孤立无援
[01:49.45]即使天空坠落，世界分崩离析，我也要寻找你
[01:56.93]就算天空坠落，一切灰飞烟灭，我也不会抛下你
